comment.author: 51039499@N08
comment._content: I'll never forget this mission as it was my birthday and i remember just where i spent it, in front of our family room tv,nervously eating party snack food ,holding my breath and watching you. It was a special time to share the event of my life with you and my 5 siblings,my parents and close friends. It is a very vivid memory that i will never forget. Peggy
